<languages/>
{{PD Help Page}}
{{Special page}}
<translate><!--T:1--> '''All pages''' is a [[<tvar name=1>Help:special page</tvar>|special page]] that lists all the pages in the wiki, optionally filtered by namespace, and delimited by a start and end title (in alphabetical order).</translate>

<translate><!--T:2--> This feature is accessible at <tvar name=1>[[Special:AllPages]]</tvar>.</translate>
<translate><!--T:3--> The page results are not adjustable in the [[<tvar name=1>Help:Preferences</tvar>|Preferences]].</translate>

== Transclusion ==
<translate><!--T:5--> This special page can be [[<tvar name=1>Help:transclusion</tvar>|transcluded]].</translate>
<translate><!--T:6--> An optional unnamed parameter can be passed after a <tvar name=1><code>/</code></tvar> character; by default, this value is used for the <tvar name=2><code>from</code></tvar> parameter, which delimits the start of the listing to all pages whose titles come after the given string (in alphabetical order).</translate>

:<code><nowiki>{{Special:AllPages/Foobar}}</nowiki></code>

<translate><!--T:7--> If the unnamed parameter matches an existing namespace name in the wiki, and ends with a colon, the value is used for the <tvar name=1><code>namespace</code></tvar> parameter instead:</translate>

:<code><nowiki>{{Special:AllPages/Help:}}</nowiki></code>

<translate><!--T:8--> Furthermore, if text is added after the colon, it is used as the <tvar name=1><code>from</code></tvar> parameter:</translate>

:<code><nowiki>{{Special:AllPages/Help:Foobar}}</nowiki></code>

<translate><!--T:15--> The following parameters change the behavior of the output and may be specified at the end, separated by pipe (<tvar name=1><code>|</code></tvar>) symbols:</translate>

{|class="sortable wikitable"
! <translate><!--T:9--> parameter</translate>
! <translate><!--T:10--> value type</translate>
! <translate><!--T:11--> description</translate>
|-
|from||string
| <translate><!--T:12--> Start of the page listing (in alphabetical order)</translate>
|-
|to||string
| <translate><!--T:13--> End of the page listing (in alphabetical order)</translate>
|-
|namespace||string
| <translate><!--T:14--> Restrict the results to the named [[<tvar name=1>Help:Namespaces</tvar>|namespace]]</translate>
|-
|hideredirects||string
| <translate><!--T:16--> Hide [[<tvar name=1>Help:Redirects</tvar>|redirects]] in the page listing</translate>
|}

[[Category:Help{{#translation:}}|{{PAGENAME}}]]
